rules.name: Is_Case_eligible_move_ahead
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) OR ((3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12) or (6 AND 7 AND 9 AND 10)
rules.label: Is Case eligible move ahead

rules.name: MRR_Is_Case_eligible_move_ahead
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12) OR ((3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12 AND 13 AND 14) OR (6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 12)
rules.label: MRR-Is Case eligible move ahead
